Vigilance
When Worn Peacekeeper dies, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with vigilance.
flavor_text: [i]“Whatever this world's got in store for us, I know for a fact the next generation can handle it better than we ever could.”[/i]

Vigilance
When Wilderness Peacekeeper enters the battlefield, tap target creature you don't control.
“It's a scary world we're living in now. Someone's gotta make it less so.”
